Digital Signage Software for Chrome
The Hypersign+ content delivery software is a tool used for publishing unique and dynamic digital signage content to your screens in seconds! With this extension, your Hypersign+ digital signage will display on screens running on Chrome devices.

The Hypersign+ software is 100% cloud based and requires no proprietary hardware to run. Enjoy the freedom of a drag-and-drop interface, unlimited users with granular permissions, and an integrated alert system that keeps you, employees, customers, and visitors safe!

With Hypersign+, you'll be able to: easily manage your media content online, drag-and-drop media for dynamic digital signage layouts,  schedule content down to the minute,
customize key widgets like weather and traffic to match your branding.

Hypersign+ is fully developed with our customers in mind. Without performing any competitor product analyses Hypersign was able to fully develop an intuitive and easy-to-use digital signage software that has been the foundation for  higher education, healthcare, enterprise and other organizations for nearly a decade.

For more information on the Hypersign+ content delivery platform, visit hypersign.com
